mapper.select: select max(a.City)city, sum(b.AllNumber) as 'allPersonCount' from Orders a join OrderDetailed b on a.Id = b.OrderId where OutDate between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by a.City

select max(City)city,max(Month(a.OutDate))StatisticsMonth,sum(b.AllNumber) as 'allPersonCount', sum(b.Price) as 'allPrice' from Orders a join OrderDetailed b on a.Id = b.OrderId where YEAR(OutDate) = #{year} group by a.City,Month(a.OutDate)
